name: timeSaved
description: Track dynamic time savings for this workflow execution

properties.name: notice
properties.displayName: Calculate time saved dynamically based on execution data. This allows you to track variable time savings (e.g., 5 minutes per item processed) instead of using a fixed value in workflow settings.

options.name: Once For All Items
options.description: Counts minutes saved once for all input items

options.name: Per Item
options.description: Multiply minutes saved by the number of input items

properties.name: minutesSaved
properties.description: Number of minutes saved by this workflow execution
